Body: On the newest version of Windows IoT, the Speech recognition and synthesis sample stopped working. Continuous dictation (number 7 in the menu), goes Idle right away once I press Dictate" button. Microphone permission is on
column9:
and everything stayed the same from the 10.0.10240 release which worked perfect.

Note that it only doesn't work when deployed to Minnow Board or Dragon Board
column10:
but works locally on the Windows PC.

Any idea on what could cause that? I've tested multiple times and when I revert back to 10.0.10240 it starts working again
column11:
but it doesn't work on the newest release.

Github link to the Microsoft Sample UWP C# project: https://github.com/Microsoft/Windows-universal-samples/tree/master/Samples/SpeechRecognitionAndSynthesis

Thanks

"

Body: Everybody facing the same problem. With the build 10586, speech recognition does not work on RPi2 anymore. When I revert back to old 10240, it works like charm. Hope, they may resolve in next build. :)
